sentences.sContent: This is the first post in an ongoing series I’m calling “back to Basics”, a “refresher course” in personal productivity.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the first post in an ongoing series I’m calling “back to Basics”, a “refresher course” in personal productivity.
sentences.sCn: 这是一篇系列文章的第一篇，我称之“回归基本”，关于个人效率的进修课程。

sentences.sContent: This is a great place to start in the podcast pool, whether you are a newb or in need of a little refresher course
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a great place to start in the podcast pool, whether you are a newb or in need of a little refresher course
sentences.sCn: 无论你是新手，还是在寻找进修课程，这都是不错的选择。

sentences.sContent: To help a dog stick with good behaviors, every few years take him for a refresher course.
sentences.sContent_eng: To help a dog stick with good behaviors, every few years take him for a refresher course.
sentences.sCn: 要想让狗狗保持良好的习惯，你应该每年带它参加一些新鲜的训练课程。

trans.tranOther: a training course, usually a short one, that teaches you about new developments in a particular subject or skill, especially one that you need for your job
